game.name: Unplugged.
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Intense rehearsals before the live show. Searching for inspiration for their next song. Performing on stage at the school festival. A story of youth and inner conflict told through the melodies of the band “Re:sonance.” A visual novel that captures the days they spend facing music—and themselves.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Intense rehearsals before the live show. Searching for inspiration for their next song. Performing on stage at the school festival. A story of youth and inner conflict told through the melodies of the band “Re:sonance.” A visual novel that captures the days they spend facing music—and themselves.
